title: Chicken Pizza
description: A carnivore's delight, where succulent chicken pieces steal the spotlight atop a cheesy canvas.
steps: Preheat your oven to 475°F (245°C).
Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface.
Spread a layer of tomato sauce on the dough.
Sprinkle mozzarella cheese over the sauce.
Add cooked chicken, bell peppers, and onions as toppings.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt, pepper, and dried oregano.
Bake in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes or until the crust is golden brown.
Slice and serve your delicious chicken pizza!

title: Margherita Pizza
description: A classic Italian masterpiece, with ripe tomatoes, fresh basil, and melted mozzarella, simplicity at its finest.
steps: Preheat your oven to 475°F (245°C).
Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface.
Spread a layer of tomato sauce on the dough.
Tear fresh mozzarella cheese and place it on the sauce.
Add fresh basil leaves as toppings.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt and black pepper.
Bake in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes or until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbly.
Slice and enjoy your classic Margherita pizza!

title: Paneer Pizza
description: A vegetarian twist with paneer cubes, colorful bell peppers, and a burst of flavors in every slice.
steps: Preheat your oven to 475°F (245°C).
Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface.
Spread a layer of tomato sauce on the dough.
Crumble paneer over the sauce.
Add sliced bell peppers, onions, and tomatoes as toppings.
Sprinkle garam masala, red chili powder, and salt over the pizza.
Bake in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes or until the crust is golden and the toppings are cooked.
Slice and savor your flavorful Paneer Pizza!

title: Mushroom Pizza
description: Earthy and aromatic, this pizza celebrates the delightful union of mushrooms and cheese.
steps: Preheat your oven to 475°F (245°C).
Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface.
Spread a layer of tomato sauce on the dough.
Sprinkle mozzarella cheese over the sauce.
Place sliced mushrooms and minced garlic cloves on top.
Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and black pepper.
Bake in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes or until the crust is crispy and the cheese is melted.
Garnish with fresh parsley before serving your delectable Mushroom Pizza!
